post.body: lol, thanks, will mess about with the green, maybe go a little darker...
cool, ok, thanks
thanks mate :D
amazing, thanks :D I changed the outer glow to black shadow with a green stroke, much better, maybe dividers green too..?
cool will do, thanks again :D
thanks, Im going to add twitter and facebook icons to the head, and some images next to the nav links, home icon, jquery logo, etc
thanks, someone else said that too, will change :)
thanks, exactly what I was looking for, I'll lose the violet on hyperlinks & the edge, any suggestions for replacement..?
lol, I'm kinda dizzy as it is!
sounds like a CSS problem, you tried giving the table block-level display...? Or maybe use padding instead of height...
at work we do something like $(" + <% ClientID %> + ") can't quite remember the exact syntax but its something like that
naah, its normally the other way round - the designers give me the images and say 'make it look like this'!
i'm happier with the code, i just dont have an eye for photos or colours ;) too used to have designers i guess lol
I hear ya, but I crave originality :D I see so many blogs/pages that just all look the same except the colours...
lol ><
are you using the $(function() { .... }) page load construct?
lol i think there's a mail strike on here so i need to do it the old-fashioned way ;)
awesome :D
good luck :D
I got google mail, we can chat through that right? mail me danwellman at gmail dot com its late here now tho...
depends on what you want to do...YUI has the most features, but jQuery is simple to use...
wicked :D much better than mine - wellmoon which my oldest friends (from school) tend to refer to me as, lol
wow, sounds like someone from the matrix! you just need a kickass nickname now ;)
you like reggae? What about some classic Floyd? Yes? Then you would love Easy All Stars - Dub Side of the Moon :D
what no JavaScript?! ;)
you need to use the PHP (with cURL) to get the file, then process with PHP and pass back JSON stream. use getJSON() instead :D
not yet, started playing with it yesterday...just went to connect to my home pc actually and no joy: Vista autosleep - FAIL :D
uh-huh: use $.load('url', 'option_data', 'optional_callback') to load a remote file with jQuery
happy to help/advise if you want to tackle it on your own though :D
me neither
cool, will look into that... there's an app in the appstore that claims to do it, i'm tempted...
try Learning jQuery by K Swedberg and J Chaffer, published by Packt :)
this is just a really simple image-loader, but its quite configurable...someone kindof asked me to write it ;)
no way man, all feedback is appreciated :D
gah... I need a dreamweaver spellchecking plugin, or maybe a firefox widget...?
appricate the feedback, will keep it mind when doing further updates :)
Doh! Thanks for pointing that out, better fix it quick :D
thanks Meg, much appreciated :D
lol thanks dude :D
thanks, I always do my bio 3rd person, I find it easier to write about myself as if I was someone else describing me...
cool, we were in, we played wii and let the kids stay up (against better judgement!) Staying in is the new going out :D
what did you get up to last night mate?
http://twitpic.com/ssxf - thanks for the tips everyone, here's how its looking now :D
http://twitpic.com/ss3g - here is my new site design, please tell me what you think...too dark? too wierd?
getting into layer masks in photoshop....now I get it :D
arg. must improve the look and content of my personal site before i start to look for a new job. wish i wasn't such a photoshop n00b!
saturday mornings represent killer boredom for me - kicking the smokes is gonna hurt most at this time...
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
total christmas shopping FAIL >< and I only have to buy for 1 person!
ha ha,' inner jock' :D well I'm certainly no jock, more of a closet geek...
RT @mckelvaney I just joined the bristol Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/bristol and you can too. Please Retweet.
TeamViewer is a great little app for remote support, free for non-commercial :D
listening to anomaly - calling your name...feeling that old-school techno vibe today ;)
do microsoft purposefully make hotmail practically unusable on the iPhone, or are they just cak..?
finished my new jQuery plugin in record time - approx 2 hours including bug-fixing :D
going to make an early start coding :D
Managed to launch the new site design in time for new year :D www.danwellman.co.uk
Happy 2000-and-fine :D
happy new year fellow twitizens :D hope its a prosperous one for us all
aiming to go live with new site design tonight! w00t!
